RelatedSentence: Brantford police are praising a citizen for helping recover a sport vehicle through twitter .

At about 11:30 a.m. Friday , police reported to the community through local media releases and twitter that a GMC Jimmy was stolen between midnight and 7:30 a.m. Shortly after noon , police say a watchful resident who follows the city police twitter feed read about the theft .
